require 'vendor/autoload.php';

use Aws\S3\S3Client;

$bucket = '*** Your Bucket Name ***';
$keyname = '*** Your Object Key ***';

$s3 = new S3Client([
    'version' => 'latest',
    'region'  => 'us-east-1'
]);

// Delete an object from the bucket.
$s3->deleteObject([
    'Bucket' => $bucket,
    'Key'    => $keyname
]);
